author: Reuters Editorial
title: Gran Bretagna, inflazione resta al 3% a gennaio, sopra attese Macroeconomia
text: LONDON, Feb 13 (Reuters) - The Office for National Statistics released the following consumer price indices on Tuesday: JAN DEC JAN FORECAST CPI (HICP) Mth-on-mth (pct) -0.5 0.4 -0.6 Yr-on-yr 3.0 3.0 2.9 Core CPI (ex- energy, food, (alcohol and tobacco) Mth-on-mth (pct) -0.8 0.3 -0.9 Yr-on-yr 2.7 2.5 2.6 CPIH (CPI plus owner occupier housing costs) Mth-on-mth -0.4 0.3 Yr-on-yr 2.7 2.7 RPI Mth-on-mth (pct) -0.8 0.8 -0.7 Yr-on-yr 4.0 4.1 4.1 RPIX (RPI ex-mortgages) Mth-on-mth -0.7 0.8 Yr-on-yr 4.0 4.2 COMPONENTS OF CPI (pct): JAN YR/YR DEC YR/YR Food & non-alcoholic bevs 0.0 3.7 0.6 3.9 Alcoholic bevs & tobacco 2.3 5.6 0.5 5.6 Clothing & footwear -3.9 3.4 -0.9 3.1 Housing,water,elec,gas,fuels 0.1 2.2 0.1 2.3 Furniture, hhold equip, main. -2.6 3.1 1.3 3.2 Health 0.6 3.0 0.1 3.2 Transport -1.0 3.4 2.2 3.8 Communication 0.1 1.2 -1.3 1.0 Recreation & culture -0.2 3.3 -0.4 2.7 Education 0.0 2.8 0.0 2.8 Restaurants & hotels -0.1 3.1 -0.1 3.1 Misc. goods & services 0.0 0.8 0.0 0.8 All goods -0.6 3.2 0.1 3.4 All services -0.4 2.8 0.7 2.5 Fuels and lubricants 0.8 2.1 0.7 4.7 CPIH owner-occupier costs 0.1 1.2 0.1 1.3 (Reporting by UK Economics Team in London)
